fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Agriculture, Trade, Consumers, International co-operation and development, Customs, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Single market, Research and innovation, External Relations, Food Safety, Digital economy and society, Climate Action
eu_initiatives:
- Monitor EU policies and analyse their impact on Brazilian companies’ ability to export products and services to the European Union  
 
- Engage with key stakeholders in EU-Mercosur relations 
 
- Engage with EU decision-makers to promote trade between the EU and Brazil
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
persons_accredited_for_access_to_europea: DE FIGUEIREDO ALVES PINTO#ALEX, TEIXEIRA QUAINI#Priscila
goals__remit:
Apex-Brasil is the Brazilian Trade Promotion and Investment Agency. Our mission is to develop the competitiveness of Brazilian companies, to promote their internationalisation as well as to attract Foreign Direct Investment to Brazil.  
 
Apex-Brasil offers a number of services to promote the sustainability and competitiveness of Brazilian companies in their internationalisation process, including market intelligence, capacity-building programmes and trade promotion activities.
relevant_communication:
Publications: Mercosur-European Union Dialogue (ISBN 978-85-66713-05-3)
